alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 9:44AM EST until December 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Souhegan River At Milford affecting Hillsborough County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souhegan River at Milford. * WHEN...From this afternoon to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Floodwaters begin to spill into the Milford Drive. Floodwaters encroach on properties on Intervale Road in Wilton and the Monadnock Water parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
